body: Love bunny girl NTR

Not NTR. Swinging. Not even cheating: Permission ain't cheating.  This doesn't really seem like a cuck situation other than the original terms: A man whose wife sleeps with other men. But that always meant a man whose wife is cheating on him without his consent. The most typical kind of cuck these days is one whose wife cheats on him with a much better equipped man (or men), while he beats off to it. Here, the wife is doing this at the husband's bidding. He's the one driving her doing this.  We also never see what his equipment might be. He's so Chad that he don't care. In the end, she's the one anxious that she lived up to what her husband wanted, so, again, he's the dominate one in this relationship, different from the usual cuck ending in manga. Interesting that Luna got most nervous was when they made her do Naked Apron, striking a bit too close to home. A cuck is weak; this guy is dominate, confident. How he seems to you...your mileage might vary.
Fucking cuck, the ending is disgusting
